fxInfo_label: HOG restriction by ethnicity, race, religion, or language
fxInfo_citation: V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
fxInfo_clarification: Language restriction should be understood as a restriction of spoken language, not literacy.
fxInfo_question: Is the eligibility of candidates for the office of head of government (when elected) formally restricted (by constitution or statute) by ethnicity, race, religion, or language?

fxInfo_responses.value: Yes, there are such statutory restrictions.
No, there are no such restrictions or the candidates are not elected.

fxInfo_sources: CCP (Elkins et al. 2012), v221, v130 ; National constitutions.
name: v2elrsthog
